pkgmetadata.longdescription: # dojoAlgo Dojo is a Python library for program traders are convenient to use our lib for program trading## InstallationUse the package manager [pip]() to install algodojo.```bashpip install algodojo```## Usage```pythonimport algodojo```## ContributingPull requests are welcome. For major changes, please open an issue first to discuss what you would like to change.Please make sure to update tests as appropriate.## License
